Shipping AND Delivery

We're dedicated to delivering your purchase as quickly and affordably as possible. We offer a range of delivery and pickup options, so you can choose the shipping method that best meets your needs.

Payment Methods

settings.text: Thanks to KCT, my wedding party looked great! All 10 groomsmen, both fathers, two ring bearers and my grooms got customs suites for an affordable price. Also, going elsewhere for my "big and tall guys" would cost significantly more. I am so thankful for the staff at KCT!

Why rent when you can buy a 3 piece suit for the same price and look like a million Bucks?!! KCT did an amazing job on my suit as well as my groomsmen and ring bear. Alterations were great. Way better people to deal with then menswear house, much nicer people too! Melda did such a wonderful job and I couldn't be happier! Thanks KCT from your old fedex delivery guy! Our wedding went great btw. I'll be back for my next suit!

settings.title: About KCT
settings.content:
Shop Kalamazoo Custom Tailoring for the latest and greatest men's fashion. KCT has the best deals on men's suits and tuxedos. Get the latest fashion trends for the best price! KCT has provided local tailoring services for southwest Michigan since 1983. Your go-to men's clothing store in Kalamazoo, Portage and Battle Creek. Located downtown Kalamazoo Michigan in the heart of the Kalamazoo Mall. Or find us inside the Crossroads Mall in Portage Michigan.

Grooms suits and groomsmen suits - providing the best men's wedding suits and wedding tuxedos for wedding parties. Best prices, better quality only at KCT Menswear. Looking for Prom Suits or Prom tuxedos in Kalamazoo, Portage and Battle Creek?! KCT Menswear has the latest and trending styles for prom. Let us suit you up for any occasion!
